dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so Kevin Mayer, the CEO of TikTok, quit after just... months. Months! Are you kidding me?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so Kevin Mayer, the C E O of TikTok, quit after just... months. Months! Are you kidding me?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: TikTok CEO Kevin Mayer has quit the company just months after taking charge...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, I mean, "just months" is kinda misleading, right? He stepped into a total dumpster fire, politically speaking.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, I mean, just months is kinda misleading, right? He stepped into a total dumpster fire, politically speaking.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A dumpster fire he, uh, willingly stepped into! Like, what did he expect? It was Chinese-owned from the jump, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A dumpster fire he, uh, willingly stepped into! Like, what did he expect? It was Chinese-owned from the jump, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But the article explicitly says, dude, he "wasn't prepared for the extent of the scrutiny." The extent.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the article explicitly says, dude, he wasn't prepared for the extent of the scrutiny. The extent.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The report added that while taking over in June, Mayer had not anticipated the extent to which TikTok would become involved in tensions between China and the US.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, come on. So he's just, like, suddenly surprised by the U.S. government's stance on data? This isn't new.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, come on. So he's just, like, suddenly surprised by the U.S. government's stance on data? This isn't new.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It wasn't just the ban, though! Sources say he felt he "wasn't given the full autonomy promised" and ByteDance's structure was "more challenging than anticipated."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It wasn't just the ban, though! Sources say he felt he wasn't given the full autonomy promised and ByteDance's structure was more challenging than anticipated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That sounds like a convenient excuse to me, frankly. He saw the writing on the wall with the ban, didn't want to deal with it, and dipped.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That sounds like a convenient excuse to me, frankly. He saw the writing on the wall with the ban, didn't want to deal with it, and dipped.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, no. Think about it. He was passed over for the Disney CEO role, right? Maybe he jumped at the TikTok offer, um, thinking it'd be this huge global role, and then realized ByteDance was gonna micromanage everything.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no. Think about it. He was passed over for the Disney C E O role, right? Maybe he jumped at the TikTok offer, um, thinking it'd be this huge global role, and then realized ByteDance was gonna micromanage everything.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mayer who had helped launch the Disney+ streaming service joined TikTok earlier this year after he was reportedly passed over for the CEO role at Disney.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: He was getting direct attacks, Peter Navarro calling him an "American puppet"! That's why he left! The political pressure was immense, unmanageable.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He was getting direct attacks, Peter Navarro calling him an American puppet! That's why he left! The political pressure was immense, unmanageable.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In July, White House trade advisor Peter Navarro called Mayer an American puppet for working at the Chinese-owned company and said that the strategy of putting a U.S. citizen in charge was not going to work.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Sure, that played a part. But if he had the autonomy to actually, like, run the company his way, maybe he fights it. This sounds more like a fundamental clash with ByteDance's internal structure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sure, that played a part. But if he had the autonomy to actually, like, run the company his way, maybe he fights it. This sounds more like a fundamental clash with ByteDance's internal structure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So you're saying he, uh, just didn't do his due diligence before taking a massive CEO job? That's kinda on him, then, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So you're saying he, uh, just didn't do his due diligence before taking a massive C E O job? That's kinda on him, then, isn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I'm saying the goalposts moved, you know? He signed up for one thing, and the reality was, like, totally different. That's a valid reason to leave, for anyone.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I'm saying the goalposts moved, you know? He signed up for one thing, and the reality was, like, totally different. That's a valid reason to leave, for anyone.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In recent weeks, as the political environment has sharply changed, I have done significant reflection on what the corporate structural changes will require, and what it means for the global role I signed up for.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, he signed up to run a Chinese-owned company that was already under fire. What "different reality" are we talking about here?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, he signed up to run a Chinese-owned company that was already under fire. What different reality are we talking about here?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The reality where he's CEO in name, but probably not in true power. That's, um, a pretty big difference for a guy used to Disney-level control.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The reality where he's C E O in name, but probably not in true power. That's, um, a pretty big difference for a guy used to Disney-level control.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: N-no, I just think he, uh, he ran away from the heat. Pure and simple.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: N-no, I just think he, uh, he ran away from the heat. Pure and simple.
